altTitles.en: Grandpa Samurai and Granddaughter of the Supreme

description.en: Just when Liu Jinshan thought he could die without regrets, his family was annihilated! As a result, he became determined to live just so that he could see his only surviving granddaughter, Liu Seol, reach adulthood. As he struggled to raise her and train her with his aging body, Liu Seol, who was born with the talent of a supreme martial artist, grew up much faster than he thought she would. "Don't worry, Grandpa, I'll protect you from now on!"

When I woke up, I discovered I had become the villain in the martial arts novel I wrote! But of all people, why does the body I possess belong to a damn villain?

Hyuk Ryun Woon:
The fourth son of the Demonic Cult’s Leader
A nasty womanizer
A martial arts weakling with a filthy temper
A worthless villain who is one shotted by the main character in the novel!

If I don’t want to be killed by the main character, I have no choice but to become strong.
“Fucking hell. The main character and whatnot, I’ll wipe them all out!”
The Shaking Tale of a distasteful villain who uses whatever means necessary to survive!

title.en: Elf to Bike to Teikoku Chiri Chousain to

altTitles.ja: エルフとバイクと帝国地理調査員と

altTitles.en: Elf and Bike and Imperial Geographic Surveyor and...

description.en: Road-movie-like manga about the perky elf and her rugged sidekick, who explores and maps an area where the situation is unclear. -AMAZ
description.ja: 帝国地理院の調査員の助手をしているエルフのノノアはバイクを駆り、相棒のカゴ―と2人で大きく変わってしまった、魑魅魍魎が跋扈する地方の街道沿いを調査。地図を更新する仕事をしていた。休息がてら泉で水浴びするノノアだが、その前に現われたのは…!?

description.fr:
Wooju est obsédé par la fortune et les superstitions. Dojin est un psychiatre qui s'avère être gay mais qui reste dans le placard (il n'a pas fait son coming-out). Alors que Dojin a un rendez-vous arrangé avec la grande sœur de Wooju, elle comprend immédiatement la situation et propose un marché avec Dojin. Elle maintiendra sa ruse pour garder la mère de Dojin heureuse en échange de l'aide de Dojin pour traiter la pathologie de Wooju.
Dojin serait-il le porte-bonheur dont Wooju a besoin...?

description.en: In a zombie apocalypse, a woman relentlessly fights for the search for new clothes so fiercely that the zombies begin to organize for better living conditions, on the other hand, a zombie with a high level of cooking wisely chooses its prey, demanding the seal. friboi, and as fate would have it, these two end up becoming lovers.
description.pt-br: Em um apocalipse zumbi, uma mulher luta implacavelmente pela busca por novas roupas de maneira tão feroz que os zumbies começam a se organizar por melhores condições de vida, em contra partida, um zumbi com alto nível de culinária escolhe sabiamente suas presas, exigindo o selo friboi, e por zueira do destino, esses dois acabam se tornando namorados.

description.en: Ai and Yuu went to buy condoms in "Safe Sex". The time goes back a little to their first encounter! A new type of everyday romantic comedy that only adults can understand.
description.ja: ある日、居酒屋で出会った優くんと愛ちゃん。はじめましてだけど、イイ感じになった2人はワンナイト…ではなく、どうなる？

title.en: The Gardener in a Hunter World

description.en:
Ji-ha, the weakest labor-class hunter with neither skill nor fighting ability, made a living by running a store while holding the lowest hunter rank.

But one day, his life as a hunter changed when he entered a garden from a different dimension through his dream...

<You have obtained Friendly Plant Lv.1> <You have obtained Blessing of XXX Lv.1>

'I gained a skill just by planting one twig...?'

His unique adventure as the sole gardener in the hunter world begins.

The world is under threat from interdimensional monsters, and only the chosen Awakened - humans possessed of special powers - can defeat them!

Sure, it sounds exciting, but it’s a far cry from reality for ordinary office worker Park Dohyeok, who’s more worried about landing a big business deal that could save his job. That is, until one day when Dohyeok’s path crosses a monster outbreak, causing him to manifest his true powers as a rare and powerful form of Awakened!

With his newfound abilities attracting eager allies and powerful enemies, will Dohyeok find that he has what it takes to survive?
description.it: Il mondo è minacciato da mostri interdimensionali e solo i prescelti "Risvegliati" - esseri umani dotati di poteri speciali - possono sconfiggerli! Certo, sembra eccitante, ma è molto lontano dalla realtà per il normale impiegato Dohyeok Park, che è più preoccupato di concludere un grosso affare che potrebbe salvargli il posto di lavoro. Questo fino a quando, un giorno, la strada di Dohyeok si incrocia con un'epidemia di mostri che gli fa manifestare i suoi veri poteri come una rara e potente forma di Risvegliato. Con le sue nuove capacità che attirano alleati desiderosi e potenti nemici, Dohyeok scoprirà di avere ciò che serve per sopravvivere?
description.ja:
平凡なサラリーマンとして日々を送っていた白虎到（はくと いたる）。 絶体絶命の危機に晒された瞬間、あれほど望んでいた覚醒者に！ しかも、２０代全てをゲームに注いだあの時の記憶と経験が覚醒の能力になるとは！！！ さらに、なんと10億分の1の確率と言われている「トリプル覚醒者」に！ 世界の頂点（トップ）を目指す呪文使い「白虎到」の奇想天外の活躍ストーリーが今、始まります。

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%98-%ED%99%80%EB%A1%9C-%EC%A3%BC%EB%AC%B8-%EC%82%AC%EC%9A%A9%EC%9E%90/2436)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/74467)
description.ko:
평범한 샐러리맨으로 살아가는 박도혁,
절체절명의 위기에 빠진 순간 그토록 원하던 각성자가 되었다!
그것도 20대 인생을 바친 게임의 기억과 경험이 내 각성 능력이 되다니!!!

더구나, 10억분의 1인 확률이라는
“무려 트리플 각성자! "

세계 최고의 정점을 노리는
주문 사용자 박도혁의 기상천외한 활약기가 지금 바로 시작됩니다.

****************
청초작가님의 인기 웹소설 본격 웹툰화

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%98-%ED%99%80%EB%A1%9C-%EC%A3%BC%EB%AC%B8-%EC%82%AC%EC%9A%A9%EC%9E%90/2436)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/74467)
description.ru:
"Было бы здорово, если бы я смог использовать все эти способности в жизни!"
Я думал, что исполнить это желание не под силу даже Богу, но в момент смертельной опасности, похоже он услышал меня.
Самое время сыграть в реальность!
Да, теперь я единственный, кто использует заклинания!

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%98-%ED%99%80%EB%A1%9C-%EC%A3%BC%EB%AC%B8-%EC%82%AC%EC%9A%A9%EC%9E%90/2436)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/74467)

title.en: Tsuihou Sareta Renkinjutsushi-san, Saikyou no Dungeon wo Tsukurimasen ka?

altTitles.ja: 追放された錬金術師さん、最強のダンジョンを創りませんか？

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsuihou Sareta Renkinjutsushi-san, Saikyou no Danjon o Tsukurimasen ka?

altTitles.en: Do you want to create the strongest dungeon, Mr. Alchemist who was expelled?
Exiled Alchemist, Why Not Create the Strongest Dungeon?

description.en: Rick, an alchemist who was banished from the strongest heroes' party, is wandering the wilds alone, when he saves a beautiful woman. It turns out that she is a dungeon spirit! Rick makes a contract with her and becomes the dungeon master. Now he is determined to create a dungeon that will defeat all the heroes!

altTitles.en: How to Live as a Fake Healer

altTitles.th: ฮีลเลอร์กำมะลอ

description.en:
One day, Seunghyeon Kang woke up to find himself in an unfamiliar world, on the continent of Azeul. At that moment, a status window pops up: 

[Your class is Healer?]

Wait, but he doesn’t have a single healing skill?! 

And so begins the life of a quack Healer who can’t cast Heal as he struggles to find a way back to his home!
Yan Shuangshuang watched her former lover die before her eyes. An angel appeared, giving her a chance to live again. However, after her rebirth, everything went wrong.

Sangwoo, an average sophomore in college, always dreamt of having multiple versions of himself - one for study, another for play.

One day, he awakens with a skill called [Cloning], and Sangwoo thinks his dream has come true. But will cloning really steer his life in the direction he had hoped for, or does fate have other plans in store?

Mizoshiri Shohei has just been assigned to the organized crime division and has already developed a crush on his senpai, experienced detective Hino Toranosuke. But when Hino gets shot, Mizo feels responsible and decides to take drastic measures.

altTitles.en: I Became a Student at the Transcension Academy
I Became a Student at Transcendental Academy

description.en:
After a hundred years of monsters, it’s become the norm to train at hunter academies if you want to become a professional monster hunter. And that’s just what hard-working orphan Seojun Kim dreams of.

But after a freak accident dashes his hopes, ads for the mysterious Transcendent Academy pop up on his phone, offering him a chance to train virtually with history’s most legendary warriors. As he levels up, he’s soon caught up in the world of hunter academies, dungeon raids, and competitive tournaments.

But the more he learns, the more questions he has about the people surrounding him, his past, and the secrets of the Transcendent Academy.
description.ko:
돌아가신 부모님의 빚을 갚으며 헌터가 되기 위해 헌터학원에 갈 돈을 모아왔던 서준은
불의의 사고로 모은 돈을 전부 수술비로 써버린다.
절망에 빠진 순간

띠링-!

이상한 광고가 재생되었다.

[야 너도 초월자 될 수 있어!]

더 이상 잃을 것도 없다, 회원 가입!!

[김서준 님 초월자 학원에 오신 걸 환영합니다].

내가 다니는 헌터학원은 다른 학원들과 '차원'이 다르다!

헌터도 학원을 다니는 헌터 사교육 시대!

야 너도 초월자 될 수 있어!

title.en: Zombie no Afureta Sekai Ore Dake ga Osowarenai

altTitles.en: Only I Am Not Attacked in a World Overflowing With Zombies

altTitles.ja: ゾンビのあふれた世界で俺だけが襲われない

altTitles.en: In A World Filled With Zombies, I’m The Only One They Won’t Attack

altTitles.pt-br: Em um Mundo Cheio de Zumbis, Eu Sou o Único que Eles Não Vão Atacar

altTitles.id: Didunia yang penuh dengan Zombie hanya aku yang tidak diserang

altTitles.zh-hk: 在遍地都是喪屍的世界裡唯獨我不被襲擊

description.en: Takemura wakes up after falling ill for 3 days and realizes the world has been overrun by zombies but for some strange reason he is not being attacked by them! What will he do now with this great power he has?
description.id: Kehidupan sehari-hari pekerja kantor yang tidak disukai "Takemura" berubah dalam sekejap. Ketika aku perhatikan, itu adalah dunia yang penuh dengan zombie. Terlebih lagi, aku satu-satunya yang tidak diserang oleh zombie. "Bantu orang? Apa itu? Aku akan menjalani dunia ini sesukaku." Takemura memiliki banyak kekuatan di dunia apokaliptik di mana peradaban akan runtuh. Apakah dia satu-satunya pahlawan yang hidup dengan menyembunyikan fakta bahwa dia tidak diserang?
description.pt-br: Na sociedade atual, que foi completamente destruída por zumbis, há um homem que misteriosamente não é atacado por eles, e essa história segue sua estilo de vida egoísta. 18 Visualizações totais, 18 Visualizações hoje

title.en: Kanojo to Kare no Kankei - Heibon na Hayakawa-san to Heibon na Miura-kun no Hibon na Kankei

altTitles.ja: 彼女と彼の関係 〜平凡な早川さんと平凡な三浦くんの非凡な関係〜

description.en:
"I wish I had a girlfriend, I don't even care who—"
"Really? Anybody? Even me?"

Kaho, who has never had a boyfriend before, wanted to have a male-female relationship.
Takumi, who wanted a girlfriend, just happened to be talking about it in front of her.
A heart-throbbing coming-of-age love story!

Saotome is a novelist who is currently having a writer's block. He has been assigned a new editor and the new person turned out to be Sasasori, his ex-classmate from high school. Saotome is now left feeling awkward because the two actually had a pseudo-romantic relationship back then.

I thought it was just platonic, spending the rest of our lives together as nothing more than friends… That was until Han Jei broke the news: “Seojin, I’m getting married.” 

Seojin, who was adopted to Germany when he was a child, has maintained a 15 year long relationship with Jei. When confronted with the prospect of Jei’s marriage, he realizes he’s in love with him. Working as a pilot, Seojin moves back to Korea in an attempt to run away, but his plan starts to unravel when Jei boards the flight to follow him. The two find themselves living together in Korea as Jei’s wedding date rapidly approaches. 

“Seojin, you’re not acting like this because of me, are you?”

As Seojin tries to push Jei away due to his emerging desires and Jei wishes to rekindle their precious friendship, they spend more time with each other and the tension between them begins to arise…
description.ko: 우정이라고 생각했다. 가장 가까운 곳에서 평생을 함께할, ...그냥 친구. "서진아, 나 결혼해." 한재이가 청천벽력 같은 소식을 전하기 전까지는. 어린 시절 독일로 입양되어 재이와 15년간 우정을 지켜온 서진. 그의 결혼이라는 현실과 맞닥뜨리고서야 재이에 대한 감정이 사랑이었음을 깨닫게 된다. 항공사 기장으로 근무하던 서진은 도망치듯 한국으로 이직하지만 재이가 서진을 따라 한국행 비행기에 오르며 계획은 점점 더 어긋나게 된다. 재이의 결혼을 앞둔 채 한국에서 아슬한 동거를 시작하게 된 두 사람. "서진아, 혹시 나 때문에 그러는 건 아니지?" 자꾸만 피어나는 욕심에 그를 밀어내려는 서진과 소중한 친구를 되찾고 싶은 재이, 함께하는 시간이 길어질수록 두 사람 사이에는 미묘한 분위기가 흐르는데…

altTitles.en: Captain Tsubasa: Road to 2002 - Go for 2006

altTitles.ja: キャプテン翼　ROAD　TO　2002

description.en:
After the World Youth, Japanese players are looking for pro careers in Japan and around the world.  
  
In order to fulfill their dream of World Cup 2002 in Korea and Japan, they must get stronger playing in various club competitions, home and abroad.

Having been transported into a world where everyone is a Job-Changer, Jiang Chen awakened the Insect Domination System! The little insects can evolve, attack, and extract talents! Most importantly, they can breed invincible natural disasters!

title.en: HUNTER x HUNTER - DIGITAL COLORED COMICS

altTitles.en: Hunter x Hunter - Digital Colored Comics

description.en: Hunters are a special breed, dedicated to tracking down treasures, magical beasts, and even other men. But such pursuits require a license, and less than one in a hundred thousand can pass the grueling qualification exam. Those who do pass gain access to restricted areas, amazing stores of information, and the right to call themselves Hunters.
description.pt-br: Versão totalmente colorida do famoso mangá "Hunter x Hunter". Hunters são uma raça especial, dedicada a rastrear tesouros, animais mágicos, e até mesmo outros homens. Mas tais atividades requerem uma licença, e menos de um em cem mil pode passar no exame de qualificação esgotante. Aqueles que não passam tem acesso a áreas restritas, lojas de incríveis informações, bem como o direito de chamar-se de Hunters.

altTitles.fr: Petit ami de temps en temps petite amie

description.en: Akizuki Hodaka, a high school student just turned 17, met the school’s madonna, Shishizaki Chihaya due to a certain turn of events. Prepared to be shot down, he gambled it all by telling her 'I love you. Please go out with me!' And that how they started going out. But Chihaya has a secret Hodaka cannot even imagine…? A kind of love changes everything. The curtain raises on a new frontier in shonen love comedy!

title.en: The Story of a Low-Rank Soldier Becoming a Monarch

altTitles.en: From the Lowest Foot Soldier to the King
From the End Soldier to the Monarch
From a Terminal Soldier to a Monarch

altTitles.ru: От рыцаря самого низкого ранга до монарха

altTitles.th: จากเบี้ยสู่ราชัน

altTitles.ja: 末端兵士が君主になるまで

description.en:
When I was 15, I lost my right arm on the battlefield… By the time I was 24, I had learned a variety of tricks that I needed in my life. -I heard such words all the time.

“Just give it up. There will only be more gray hair on my head if I teach you sojutsu. "
"If you want to learn something, then there are no barriers in front of you, but your productivity is too lame."
“Hey, let's pick the herbs, herbs. Why are you trying to learn only the art of the sword?"
"Just live like everyone else."

---
When Chris, a one-armed mercenary with considerable experience and skills, swallows an artifact after an unlikely encounter with a savage looter, he finds himself back in the past as a 15-year-old lowly foot soldier... with both his arms. This time, he will not let his life take an unfortunate turn. This time, he will not let his friends die in vain. This time, he will use his knowledge and reach for the sky.

---
- [Alternative Raw (Naver)](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=5912441)
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/12396)
description.ko:
다시 시작된 전장, 15세 말단 병사 시절. 
 
15세, 전장에서 오른팔을 잃고… 
 
24년, 살기 위해 닥치는 대로 온갖 잡기를 익혔지만 
―늘 비슷한 말을 들었다. 
 
“그냥 하지 마라. 너한테 창술 가르치다가 흰머리만 늘겠다.” 
“배우려면 못 배울 것도 없지만, 효율이 너무 떨어진다.” 
“야, 약초 캐자, 약초. 왜 굳이 검술을 배우려고 그러냐?” 
“그냥 평범하게 살아.” 
 
―그렇게 39세, 
왼팔마저 잘리고 벼랑으로 떨어졌다. 
정체 모를 아티팩트를 삼킨 채… 
 
 
【 그 릿 탐 색 중 … 】 
 
― 성장의의지 
 
― 배움의탐욕 
 
― 근면한욕심 
 
― 열정과집념 
 
― 재능없는끈기 
 
― …회귀본능 
 
 
한물간 용병 크리스에서 소년병 크리스로! 
 
 
《 경 험 치 가 올 랐 습 니 다 ! 》 
 
― 이것은 노련한 소년이 전장에서 출세하는 이야기 
 
《 경 험 치 가 올 랐 습 니 다 ! 》 
 
― 이것은 재능 없는 자가 한계를 돌파하는 이야기 
 
《 경 험 치 가 올 랐 습 니 다 ! 》 
 
― 이것은 평범한 자가 스스로 기사가 되는 이야기 
 
《 경 험 치 가 올 랐 습 니 다 ! 》 
 
― 이것은 비범한 군주가 자기 사람들을 지키는 이야기 
 
《 경 험 치 가 올 랐 습 니 다 ! 》 
 
― 이것은 되돌아온 자가 대륙을 구원하는 이야기 

 
《《《 경 험 치 가 전 부 충 족 되 었 습 니 다 ! 》》》

---
- [Original Webtoon <Naver>](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=5912441)

- [Original Webtoon <kakao>](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=56065304)

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/12396/)
description.ru:
Когда мне было 15, я потерял свою правую руку на поле битвы...

К 24 годам я научился разным уловках, без которых в жизни мне стало не обойтись
-Я всё время слышал подобные слова.

«Просто брось это дело. На моей голове появится только больше седых волос, если я буду обучать тебя содзюцу»
«Если ты хочешь чему-то научиться, то перед тобой нет преград, однако твоя продуктивность слишком хромает»
«Эй, давай срывать травы, травы. Почему пытаешься научиться лишь искусству меча?»
«Просто живи, как все».

―А когда мне было 39 лет,
Я лишился левой руки и упал с утёса.
Проглотив артефакт, о сущности которого мне ничего было неизвестно...

【Поиск сил… 】

- Готовность к росту

- Желание познаний

- Горячая жадность

- Сила и упорство

- Старания без таланта

-… Оборот инстинктов

После битвы я очнулся вновь 15-летним солдатом.

《Очки опыта выросли! 》

《Очки опыта выросли! 》

《Очки опыта выросли! 》

《Очки опыта выросли! 》

《Очки опыта выросли! 》

Из побитого жизнью наемника Криса я превратился в молодого парня-солдата Криса!

- Это история искусного юноши, добившегося успеха на поле боя.

- Это история человека без таланта, выходящего за границы обычного

- Это история простого человека, который сам становится рыцарем.

- Это история о необыкновенном монархе, защищающем свой народ.

- Это история о человеке, который вернулся ради спасения континента.

《Очки опыта получены!》

---
- [Original Webtoon <Naver>](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=5912441)

- [Original Webtoon <kakao>](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=56065304)

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/12396/)
description.zh:
年少的克里斯在战场上失去了他的右手。几经消沉的他认清现实后，决心靠一只手臂生存下去，并成为了一个精通各种求生战斗技能的“佣兵”。一次任务，克里斯小队遭到了毁灭性打击，山穷水尽的克里斯带着无尽的遗憾坠入了冰冷的河水，可迎接他的不是死亡，而是....重生。这一次他能逆转人生走上巅峰吗！

---
- [Original Webtoon <Naver>](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=5912441)

- [Original Webtoon <kakao>](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=56065304)

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/12396/)

description.en:
When you wake up after hitting your head, your sex drive will be multiplied by 4000?!

Seigo Hasegawa, a man who has suddenly acquired a cheat sex drive, and his childhood friend An Yagami, who feels responsible for Seigo and tries to help him (sexually). The battle between Seigo and his sexual desire begins now... (MTL)
description.ru: Мозг - величайший «черный ящик» в теле человека. Например, мальчик, получивший мячом по голове, может вспомнить случайный опыт или вещь, которые он когда-либо видел, как если бы это была картинка. Или сотрудник компании, никогда не игравший на фортепиано, получивший сотрясение мозга и потерявший сознание, после пробуждения выдавал бесчисленные композиции. Есть еще множество неизученных участков мозга человека при стимулировании которых неизвестно, что произойдет… В этой истории Хасегава Сейго крепко ударился головой и повредил обе руки при спасении своей подруги, когда та упала со стремянки в библиотеке. Чувствуя свою ответственность за травмы лучшего друга, подруга решительно вызывается во всем помогать Сейго в его непростом состоянии.

description.en:
Zhu Yunwen, who barely survived the Jingnan campaign, received the souls of two of the world's strongest martial artists, the First Heavenly Demon of the Demonic Cult and Huineng, the Sixth Patriarch of the Shaolin Temple, in his body, and was reborn as Heaven Destroyer.

This is the story of the Heaven Destroyer's journey to become an absolute existence!

altTitles.zh: 同一屋檐下，阿斯伯格的她

description.en:
Yokoi is a manga artist who spends his nights delivering newspapers just to make rent, since his original works just don’t seem to sell.

Suddenly, one day he gets a visit from Saito-san, a self-proclaimed fan of Yokoi’s work who made the long journey to meet him. Yokoi quickly realizes that the things Saito-san sees, feels, and thinks about are different from most people…

These two struggle together to find a place to belong in this unique slice-of-life!

---
Chinese translation follows online raw chapter numbering starting from Chapter 27. English translation follows tankoubon raw chapter numbering.

altTitles.en: I Am Going to Be a Bastard
I Want to Be a Scoundrel
I'm Going to Be a Great Villain
I Want to Be a Big Baddie

description.en:
A proper villain must be ruthless and evil, a bringer of death! Having tormented the protagonist to his heart's content, he makes a brilliant exit. Once he's finished his work, he goes out with a bang.
Wang Yi was determined to be that kind of villain. Unfortunately… His male lead can read minds. (:з)∠*)
“You mongrel!” Mr. Yi chuckled as he looked down on the novel’s male lead.
Suddenly, a thought bubble filled with cute emojis (⁄ ⁄ ⁄ω⁄ ⁄ ⁄) and the words “You’re so cute…” appeared in front of Qin.
Qin: ?

title.en: The Saga of Tanya the Evil

altTitles.de: Die Militärischen Aufzeichnungen eines kleinen Mädchens

altTitles.th: บันทึกสงคราม ของยัยเผด็จการ

altTitles.es: Crónicas de una niña en guerra

altTitles.it: La saga di Tanya la malvagia
Le cronache militari di una ragazzina

altTitles.pt: Crônicas Militares de uma Pequena Garota

altTitles.en: The Military Chronicles of a Little Girl

altTitles.es-la: La Saga de Tanya la Malvada

description.en:
A young girl fights on the frontlines in war. She has blonde hair, blue eyes, and nearly transparent white skin 
as she flies through the air and mercilessly strikes down her enemies. 
Her name is Tanya Degurechaff and speaks with a young girl's lisp while she commands the army. 
Tanya used to be one of Japan's elite office workers, but because of a wrathful god was reborn as a little girl. 
Prioritizing optimization and career advancement above all, she will become the most dangerous entity 
among the Imperial Army's sorcerers.  

Adapted from Light Novel of same name.  

---

**Note:** Manga and Light Novel Licensed in English by Yen Press as "The Saga of Tanya the Evil".
description.es-la: Una joven chica que lucha en el frente de una guerra. Tiene el pelo rubio, ojos azules y una piel blanca, casi transparente, y es conocida por moverse como el viento en el campo de batalla. Ella es Tanya Degurechaff y se encarga de dirigir al ejército. Solía ser un asalariado de élite en Japón, pero debido a la ira de un dios, renació como una niña pequeña. Tanya lo da todo por avanzar en su carrera militar y se convertirá en la maga más poderosa del ejército imperial.

description.en:
The law is flawed and I'll be the one who will make it perfect. Blame the law that released you.  
  
Art done by the creator of [HIVE](https://www.webtoons.com/en/thriller/hive/list?title_no=65).
  
[Official Trad. Chinese](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/feifazhengyi/list?title_no=1434&page=1)  
 [Official Thai](https://www.webtoons.com/th/action/vigilante/list?title_no=1488&page=1)
description.pt-br: A lei é falha e serei eu quem a tornará perfeita. Culpe a lei que te soltou.

title.en: The Count’s Youngest Son Is a Player

description.en:
[Activating closed beta system. Current number of users: 1.]

Bae DoHyun lost his life because of the major guilds' evil plan. He then possesed the main character in a game that’s still in its beta service.

Reincarnated as Rich family’s youngest son, Raul.

“I’ll take it all this time!”

From Rank 1 player to the most powerful NPC, his new story begins.

The Kingdom of Parsemis is a land blessed by an ancient dragon. In this kingdom, the evil Prime Minister Andrim remembers his past life while his daughter's marriage engagement to the crown prince is being broken. At the same time, he realizes that this world is that of an otome game that he was playing in his past life. In the game, his daughter is the evil fiancée of the crown prince and he is destined to be executed alongside her. Unable to accept this, Andrim devises a plan to trap the game's conquest targets, who side with the crown prince. He will stop at nothing for revenge including seducing his own rival...

altTitles.en: Only I Farm in the Dungeon
I'm the Only One Farming in the Dungeon

description.en: Sejun, your average Seoul underdog, didn’t expect to grow tomatoes full-time when he stumbled into the mysterious dungeon full of monster quests and extravagant rewards. Yet, there he was, as a farmer growing and selling cash crops while clearing numerous quests that came his way. Will Sejun make it out of the dungeon with the plush rewards he hoped for? At least he has what it takes: optimism, resourcefulness, and a group of loyal furry friends.
description.it: Un giorno, una misteriosa torre apparve improvvisamente in città. La gente decise di chiamarla dungeon, e sebbene fosse pieno di asperità e mostri pericolosi, era anche una terra di opportunità, dove erano in attesa innumerevoli tesori. Quando Sejun, un giovane che vive una vita normale, viene invitato per caso nel dungeon sotterraneo, è entusiasta all'idea di diventare ricco, ma è rimasto bloccato in una zona nascosta della torre misteriosa. Tutto quello che ha sono alcuni semi e il suo corpo. Ora Sejun deve coltivare, raccogliere risorse e capire come sopravvivere!

altTitles.ja: キラキラしても、しなくても

description.en: Sparkling love is not the only kind there is. Keita is a high school student who likes his friend Masato. However, his love could not be more different from the sort of sparkling love often seen in BL… This is a delicate, bittersweet story of adolescence.
description.ja: キラキラした恋、だけじゃない。高校生の慶太は、友だちの正人のことが好き。しかし、BLでよく見るようなキラキラした恋と自分の恋は、似ても似つかなくてーー。ほろ苦く繊細な、青い春の物語。
description.es-la: Un amor deslumbrante no es el único tipo que hay. Keita es un estudiante de preparatoria al que le gusta su amigo Masato. Sin embargo, su amor no está ni cerca de ser como los amores deslumbrantes que se ven seguido en los BL… Esta es una historia agridulce y delicada de la adolescencia.

description.en:
Baili Jin, a fairy who was living in heaven, eating and drinking without a care, broke her Majesty’s colourful, stained-glass plate at her birthday and got banished to the mortal realm. Now she has to begin her adventures in the mortal realm with all of her spiritual powers gone! In order to survive, the former fairy has to deliver take-out….  
  
An endearingly silly fairy, a gentle restaurant manager, a reserved top student and a hard to resist yandere onee-san (kind on the outside, dark/possessive on the inside) , let the story of their beautiful friendship and youthful days begin!  
  
Author's weibo: [@Viva喂娃酱](https://weibo.com/vivaandjulys)   
Artist's weibo: [@Julys橘奶司](https://weibo.com/julys0723)

The story in Dragon Ball Kakumei picks up right after the Tournament of Power and deals with the consequences of Android 17 restoring the erased universes. In addition to the six universes destroyed by Zeno, the wish brought back Universe 19, which has warriors that are powerful enough to take down Zeno and the angels.
description.pt-br:
“Quando o desejo do Androide 17 no final do Torneio do Poder leva o mundo a uma Guerra Multiversal, aliados de todos os universos terão que se fortalecer para enfrentar divindades malignas e, desta vez, eles terão que defender todos sem Goku”.

Criado pelos franceses Darkows (roteiro), Reenko (roteiro) e Poissonlabo (desenhista), Dragon Ball Kakumei é um mangá não oficial que conta uma história alternativa se caso o desejo do Androide 17, ao fim do Torneio do Poder, restaurasse os 18 universos que existiam originalmente, levando a uma Guerra Multiversal entre grandes divindades, mas sem a presença de Son Goku.

Com uma arte atípica, em se tratando de um mangá feito por fãs (que geralmente costumam tentar emular os traços de Akira Toriyama), além de uma história com uma narrativa e proposta bem diferente da leveza e simplicidade da obra original, Dragon Ball Kakumei é, sem dúvidas, um dos mangás não oficiais de Dragon Ball mais famosos, ao lado de outros projetos de fãs como Dragon Ball AF e Dragon Ball Multiverse.

title.en: My Lucky Encounter From the Game Turned Into Reality

altTitles.en: The Dream in the Game Becomes Reality

description.en:
Who says revenge is vain? It's so fun!

In a world where magic is extremely advanced and boasts a civilization that is no different from science fiction, he has reincarnated into the noble 'Rondel' family.

However, born as the child of a commoner concubine, his life is threatened by the first wife and half-brother. He acquired the role of 'Manuel Lucas', the great mage who changed the world. And a refreshing revenge story begins!

'From now on, I'm going to live the life I wanted'
Sporadically posted comic pages on the official twitter of the Bombergirl arcade game.

Kawataro, half human, half kappa, lives as a human, because his father, a kappa, wished so. Kawataro travels to find his mother who disappeared when he was young. On his trip, he encounters various youkai.

“Huh?! Kyaaaaak!!! W-Why did I suddenly become an anchovy?!!!”

He majors in food and nutrition and has a first-class certificate as a daily sports instructor, the epitome of being a fitness enthusiast, Choi Young-jik! Well, that was who he used to be…

Waking up in the body of Prince Soo-yang, the second son of King Se-jong the Great, he lost all of his bulging muscles overnight.

Young-jik was taken aback when he realized he might be able to meet King Se-jong, his father. He couldn’t contain his excitement at the thought of meeting the magnificent King Se-jong, whether or not it was a dream or reality.

H-Huh? King Se-jong… the Great???

There sits in front of him, a chubby man who looks like he’s struggling to breath.

King Se-jong the Great appears to be severely obese and possibly diabetic… Government officials had chronic illnesses and frail bodies… Choi Young-jik, a seasoned fitness trainer with 15 years under his belt- holding the pride of the fitness community- begins to feel a fire ignite inside him.

“Alright, shall I try spreading the fitness craze in Joseon?!”

It all started like a typical old-school boys’ love plotline—bad-boy senior meets adorably awkward underclassman, one of them falls in love, and so on and so forth. But although Miyano is a self-proclaimed boys’ love expert, he hasn’t quite realized…he’s in one himself. Which means it’s up to Sasaki to make sure their story has a happily ever after…!
A girl saves Houjou family's third daughter from drowning herself. The girl takes her place as Houjou Ran who shall become the Tendou family's bride but her deceit is seen through..?

Josh, who is unemployed, takes home on a whim a bundle of answer sheets he sees at a found object collection center. He meets a girl, Mika Nagasaki, who is looking for the bundle, and through his involvement with her and the people around her, he comes face to face with the love he himself is dragged into.

---
Note: Includes an oneshot called Neko Sagashi.

Dungeons are the stuff of dreams—defeat the monsters, take their loot, and then venture into uncharted territory to discover hidden riches! Tina, an upstart adventurer with just such a dream, ends up mortally wounded while exploring a dungeon. Suddenly, the great demon known as the Beast King Garon, who was supposed to have been slain by a hero in the distant past, appears before her!  Dungeon fantasy meets medical drama!
description.ru:
Подземелья - это воплощение мечты…
Собирайте материалы с поверженных монстров,
добирайтесь до неисследованных мест и завладевайте сокровищами!
Тина, авантюристка, мечтает о таком успехе,
Исследуя подземелье, она получает тяжелое ранение.
Перед ней появляется сильнейший демон «Король зверей Гарон», когда-то в прошлом он должен был быть убит героем?..

Фэнтези и медицинская драма по мотивам подземелья от Konda Tatsukazu, автора оригинальной истории «Ginrou Bloodborne/Серебряный волк, рожденный в крови», начинается!

description.en: 1000 years ago, the MC became a normal zombie in the apocalypse. In order to survive the constant hunting of humans, he continued to train himself until he became immensely powerful. After 1000 years passed, he is now ready to enter human society again.

Scholar Woon Hyun enters the palace after passing the Imperial Examination.
Though he soon comes to lament his poor and miserable life of having to deal with the Crown Prince’s hobbies,
Despite that, he doesn’t give up and tries his best to learn martial arts.
But Woon Hyun suddenly picks up his brush to conquer the Murim?!

The hidden story of the scholar who passed the Imperial Examination at a young age begins. 

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%95%99%EC%82%AC%EA%B2%80%EC%A0%84/2895)
description.ko:
장원에 급제하여 입궁한 학사 운현.
황태자의 취미생활을 전담하는 초라하고 처량한 신세를 한탄하지만,
그럼에도 포기하지 않고 최선을 다해 무공을 익힌다.
그러던 운현은 갑자기 무림을 제패하기 위해 붓을 드는데?!

젊은 나이에 장원에 급제한 학사의 숨겨진 이야기가 시작된다.

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%95%99%EC%82%AC%EA%B2%80%EC%A0%84/2895)

title.en: The Hundred Ghost Stories That Led to My Death

altTitles.ja: 僕が死ぬだけの百物語
Boku ga Shinu dake no Hyakumonogatari

altTitles.en: Hundred Ghost Stories of My Own Death

description.en: Anthology horror series detailing the "Round of 100 Ghost Stories", an old folktale believed to originate from Japan retold through the lens of Yuuma, a boy who lives in a troubled household. Often used as a test of courage where participants tell one hundred supernatural stories and blow out one candle then look at themselves in the mirror after they finish each story. When the one-hundredth candle is blown out, it is said that ghosts and demons are summoned to our world.
description.pt-br: Série de terror antológica detalhando a "Rodada das 100 Histórias de Fantasmas", muitas vezes usado como um teste de coragem, onde os participantes contam cem histórias sobrenaturais,  apagam uma vela e se olham no espelho depois de terminar cada história. Quando a centésima vela é apagada, diz-se que fantasmas e demônios são convocados ao nosso mundo. Um antigo conto popular originário do Japão recontado por de Yuuma, um menino que vive em uma casa problemática.

title.en: The Fairytale-like You Goes on the Assault

altTitles.ja: 儚いキミは猛攻をはじめる

altTitles.ja-ro: Hakanai Kimi wa Moukou wo Hajimeru

altTitles.zh: 童话般的你开始了恋爱猛攻

description.en: Kagari, an ephemeral beauty, reunites with her older childhood friend, Nana-kun, and begins her romantic assault on him.
description.vi: Một series siêu ngọt nữa tới từ Hazano Kazutake - tác giả của bộ Thánh nữ Cecilia và mục sư Lawrence. Câu chuyện về đôi bạn thưở nhỏ cứ tối đến là lại ở chung nhà để đảm bảo sự an toàn cho nhau...

description.en: Tae, a beautiful 17-year-old girl, and Kotaro, a serious office worker. These two seemingly happy people have a secret they can't reveal to anyone - the rival ninjas of Iga and Kouga secretly live together in this laid-back romantic comedy!
description.ja: 17歳の美少女・たえと、まじめな会社員の小太郎。一見幸せそうに見える二人には誰にも言えない秘密があった――伊賀・甲賀のライバル忍者がこっそり同棲生活を送る、まったりラブコメ！
description.pt-br: Tae, uma linda garota de 17 anos, e Kotaro, um sério trabalhador de escritório. Essas duas pessoas aparentemente felizes têm um segredo que não podem revelar a ninguém - os ninjas rivais de Iga e Kouga vivem secretamente juntos nesta comédia romântica descontraída!

altTitles.ja: 無限レベルアップin武林

description.en:
Killed on the battlefield without glory to his name, Yuseong Dan receives an opportunity to grow stronger with a strange quest and level system. But each quest he’s forced to fight only seems to be getting harder and harder. Can he level up enough to avoid the same miserable ending and become the powerful hero he wishes to be?

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001443)
description.ja:
ここは努力したぶん強くなれる世界

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001443)
description.ko:
재능도 없고 출신도 비천했던 하급무사 단유성, 전쟁터에서 죽다.
하지만 저승인 줄 알고 눈을 떴더니, 어린 시절의 과거로 돌아와 있지 않은가?
이상한 숫자와 문자가 눈 앞에 보이고, 그 지시를 따르면 노력한 만큼 보상을 받기까지 한다.
노력한 만큼의 보상을 받는 세상. 무한레벨업 in 무림에 오신것을 환영합니다.

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001443)
description.ru:
Тан Ю Сон, младший воин, не имевший таланта, с низким уровнем подготовки, погиб на поле боя.

Но когда он открыл глаза, он был сильно удивлён! Он вернулся в свое прошлое, когда ещё был ребёнком! Теперь он может изменить будущее!

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001443)
description.pt-br: Morto no campo de batalha sem glória para seu nome, Yuseong Dan recebe a oportunidade de ficar mais forte com uma estranha missão e sistema de níveis. Mas cada missão que ele é forçado a lutar parece estar ficando cada vez mais difícil. Ele pode subir de nível o suficiente para evitar o mesmo final miserável e se tornar o herói poderoso que deseja ser?
